metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14628 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: An information leak vulnerability was discovered in Samba's LDAP server.Due to missing access control checks, an authenticated but unprivilegedattacker could discover the names and preserved attributes of deletedobjects in the LDAP store.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
